item.title: About
item.description: $> whoami Reach out, we’ll have a beer. If I like you we’ll switch to whisky. Why this website? I like tech and offsec stuff. Sometimes I feel like sharing. Why ‘erk3’ ? Because Ecky-Ecky-Ecky-erk3-Pakang-Zoom-Boing-Gumzowehzeh.

item.title: Intigriti's monthly challenge - May 2022

Thanks @PiyushThePal for the challenge! üëáhttps://t.co/X0nq805bVE — INTIGRITI (@intigriti) May 27, 2022 / First contact While browsing the website, one can notice the ?page=x query parameter having different integer values in the URI. A quick glance at the website source code then leads to a particular <script> tag handling it:
